summary: Paul Aaron Friedman is an American physician and author. He is the author of 'The biochemical mechanisms by which drugs exert their therapeuticand toxic effects' He was born January 3, 1943, in Baltimore, Maryland, and grew up in Chestnut Hill, Massachusetts, with his wife and two children. His work has been published in journals such as The Lancet and The New England Journal of Medicine.
